title: Thursday afternoon headlines: Baltimore officials urge caution during Easter gatherings; Cocaine found on ship near Annapolis; and more
body: – WYPR News – The Sun – WMAR-TV – Maryland Matters – WTOP News  Explore Baltimore Fishbowl Hogan ‘concerned’ about COVID variants, says Maryland's rising cases are unrelated to recently eased restrictions The Village How much bread does a hungry city need? 1.4 million loaves, donated by H&S Bakeries New restaurant Bar One to open in Gordon Biersch Brewery space Weekly Wellness Tip by Fit For You:   A Pound of Muscle vs. A Pound of Fat Topgolf has paused new construction, but BDC still expects work on Baltimore location by the summer
